alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Hill; Limestone; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 10:56PM CDT until October 05 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Limestone County in central Texas... Eastern Hill County in central Texas... Southwestern Ellis County in north central Texas... Navarro County in north central Texas... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1055 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Bardwell to Blooming Grove to Hillsboro, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Corsicana, Hillsboro, Italy, Hubbard, Coolidge, Blooming Grove, Dawson, Angus, Barry, Navarro, Bynum, Carl`s Corner, Navarro Mills Lake, Lake Halbert, Richland-Chambers Reservoir, Aquilla Lake, Milford, Frost, Retreat and Oak Valley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 358 and 369. Interstate 35W between mile markers 1 and 2. Interstate 35E between mile markers 371 and 384. Interstate 45 between mile markers 213 and 235. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
